@dataclass
class KeyOptions(dataclasses_json.api.DataClassJsonMixin): 
33@dataclass
34class KeyOptions(DataClassJsonMixin):
35    """
36    Key Options
37    """
38
39    comment: Optional[str] = ""
40    expiration_date: Optional[str] = field(
41        default="", metadata=dataclass_config(exclude=lambda f: f == "")
42    )
43    time_to_live_in_seconds: Optional[int] = field(
44        default=-1, metadata=dataclass_config(exclude=lambda f: f == -1)
45    )
46    scopes: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)
47    tags: Optional[List[str]] = field(
48        default=None, metadata=dataclass_config(exclude=lambda f: f is None)
49    )
50
51    def __getitem__(self, key):
52        _dict = self.to_dict()
53        if _dict["scopes"] is not None:
54            _dict["scopes"] = [str(scopes) for scopes in _dict["scopes"]]
55        if _dict["tags"] is not None:
56            _dict["tags"] = [str(tags) for tags in _dict["tags"]]
57        return _dict[key]
58
59    def __setitem__(self, key, val):
60        self.__dict__[key] = val
61
62    def __str__(self) -> str:
63        return self.to_json(indent=4)

158@dataclass
159class KeyResponse(DataClassJsonMixin):
160    """
161    Key Response object
162    """
163
164    api_key: Key
165    member: Member
166
167    def __getitem__(self, key):
168        _dict = self.to_dict()
169        if "api_key" in _dict:
170            _dict["api_key"] = Key.from_dict(_dict["api_key"])
171        if "member" in _dict:
172            _dict["member"] = Member.from_dict(_dict["member"])
173        return _dict[key]
174
175    def __setitem__(self, key, val):
176        self.__dict__[key] = val
177
178    def __str__(self) -> str:
179        return self.to_json(indent=4)

class ManageClient(deepgram.clients.abstract_sync_client.AbstractSyncRestClient): 
 43class ManageClient(AbstractSyncRestClient):  # pylint: disable=too-many-public-methods
 44    """
 45    A client for managing Deepgram projects and associated resources via the Deepgram API.
 46
 47    This class provides methods for performing various operations on Deepgram projects, including:
 48    - Retrieving project details
 49    - Updating project settings
 50    - Managing project members and scopes
 51    - Handling project invitations
 52    - Monitoring project usage and balances
 53
 54    Args:
 55        config (DeepgramClientOptions): all the options for the client.
 56    """
 57
 58    _logger: verboselogs.VerboseLogger
 59    _config: DeepgramClientOptions
 60    _endpoint: str
 61
 62    def __init__(self, config: DeepgramClientOptions):
 63        self._logger = verboselogs.VerboseLogger(__name__)
 64        self._logger.addHandler(logging.StreamHandler())
 65        self._logger.setLevel(config.verbose)
 66
 67        self._config = config
 68        self._endpoint = "v1/projects"
 69        super().__init__(config)
 70
 71    # projects
 72    def list_projects(
 73        self,
 74        timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None,
 75        addons: Optional[Dict] = None,
 76        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
 77        **kwargs,
 78    ) -> ProjectsResponse:
 79        """
 80        List all projects for the current user.
 81        """
 82        return self.get_projects(
 83            timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
 84        )
 85
 86    def get_projects(
 87        self,
 88        timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None,
 89        addons: Optional[Dict] = None,
 90        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
 91        **kwargs,
 92    ) -> ProjectsResponse:
 93        """
 94        Gets a list of projects for the authenticated user.
 95
 96        Reference:
 97        https://developers.deepgram.com/reference/get-projects
 98        """
 99        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_projects ENTER")
100        url = f"{self._config.url}/{self._endpoint}"
101        self._logger.info("url: %s", url)
102        self._logger.info("addons: %s", addons)
103        self._logger.info("headers: %s", headers)
104        result = self.get(
105            url, timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
106        )
107        self._logger.info("json: %s", result)
108        res = ProjectsResponse.from_json(result)
109        self._logger.verbose("result: %s", res)
110        self._logger.notice("get_projects succeeded")
111        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_projects LEAVE")
112        return res

A client for managing Deepgram projects and associated resources via the Deepgram API.

This class provides methods for performing various operations on Deepgram projects, including:

  • Retrieving project details
  • Updating project settings
  • Managing project members and scopes
  • Handling project invitations
  • Monitoring project usage and balances

Args: config (DeepgramClientOptions): all the options for the client.

ManageClient(config: deepgram.options.DeepgramClientOptions)

64        self._logger.addHandler(logging.StreamHandler())
65        self._logger.setLevel(config.verbose)
66
67        self._config = config
68        self._endpoint = "v1/projects"
69        super().__init__(config)

 43class AsyncManageClient(
 44    AbstractAsyncRestClient
 45):  # pylint: disable=too-many-public-methods
 46    """
 47    A client for managing Deepgram projects and associated resources via the Deepgram API.
 48
 49    This class provides methods for performing various operations on Deepgram projects, including:
 50    - Retrieving project details
 51    - Updating project settings
 52    - Managing project members and scopes
 53    - Handling project invitations
 54    - Monitoring project usage and balances
 55
 56    Args:
 57        config (DeepgramClientOptions): all the options for the client.
 58    """
 59

 61    _config: DeepgramClientOptions
 62    _endpoint: str

 65        self._logger = verboselogs.VerboseLogger(__name__)
 66        self._logger.addHandler(logging.StreamHandler())
 67        self._logger.setLevel(config.verbose)
 68        self._config = config
 69        self._endpoint = "v1/projects"
 70        super().__init__(config)

A client for managing Deepgram projects and associated resources via the Deepgram API.

This class provides methods for performing various operations on Deepgram projects, including:

  • Retrieving project details
  • Updating project settings
  • Managing project members and scopes
  • Handling project invitations
  • Monitoring project usage and balances

Args: config (DeepgramClientOptions): all the options for the client.

AsyncManageClient(config: deepgram.options.DeepgramClientOptions)

66        self._logger.addHandler(logging.StreamHandler())
67        self._logger.setLevel(config.verbose)
68        self._config = config
69        self._endpoint = "v1/projects"
70        super().__init__(config)
